name: Two Tails Tale Alpha
description:
In an abandoned Villa, the two small adventurers, Minx and Lowell, aid their village with a small errand. This small demo follows our couple in their search to find materials to build a new church. This is a proof of concept and only partially represents what the final game will be like. Please send any suggestion and/or critiques our way on our Discord server here:
https://discord.gg/Yt6sgs7

kickstarter
